name: Young Void Dragon
description: The Young Void Dragon embodies chaos and power, exhibiting a large stature and formidable presence with a striking appearance that reflects its alien nature.
memorable: It possesses powerful breath weapons, including Gravitic Breath and Stellar Breath, capable of imposing battlefield control and dealing devastating damage.
goals: To unleash chaos and inflict damage upon foes, while navigating both physical and void environments effortlessly.
relations: Related to other dragon species and potentially allied with creatures of the Void.
environment: Typically found in chaotic, alien planes or regions steeped in elemental conflict.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage and innate resistance to charm or fear effects, along with high Constitution and significant bite and claw attacks.
weaknesses: Despite high resilience, it may struggle against coordinated efforts from large groups or ambush tactics.
attacks: Multitiered attacks with a powerful bite and sharp claws, alongside elemental breath attacks delivering substantial fire and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Chill of the Void negates cold damage resistances, making it a particularly dangerous adversary against cold-resistant foes.
senses: The dragon has blindsight up to 30 feet, allowing it to perceive threats without relying on sight.
skills: It possesses excellent knowledge of the Arcana and History skills, enhancing its tactical abilities.
additional_information: Can exist without air, food, or sleep due to its void nature.
Has the ability to twist reality to improve its defense against attacks.
Exhibits keen awareness reflected in a high passive Perception score.
Possesses powerful area control abilities through its breath weapons.
Represents an amalgamation of dragon traits and elemental chaos.
test_queries: large dragon that navigates the Void
dragon that breathes fire and radiant energy
monster skilled in Arcana and History
powerful dragon with devastating breath weapons
